tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE product_manuals (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    manual_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE troubleshooting_guides (
    guide_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    guide_name VARCHAR(255),
    guide_content TEXT,
    product_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES product_manuals(manual_id)
);

CREATE TABLE product_manuals (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  manual_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE troubleshooting_guides (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  issue_category VARCHAR(255),
  guide_steps TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE user_reviews (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  rating INT,
  review_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SupportTickets ( 
	ticket_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
	customer_id UUID, 
	issue_description TEXT, 
	priority VARCHAR(50), 
	status VARCHAR(50), 
	created_at TIMESTAMP 
);
